channel.title: A Nightmare on Elm Street
channel.description:
[url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cKs6u5qPRSM&feature=topvideos']https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cKs6u5qPRSM&feature=topvideos[/url]
So what do you guys think?
I think its going to fail horribly. Lol Freddy sounds like some 12 yr old kid that plays CS :meh: There wasn't anything wrong with the original why remake it? Nothing can top the original.

item.title: A Nightmare on Elm Street
item.dc:creator: Dias
item.description:
You didn’t miss much. The first one was shit, and I can’t begin to imagine how bad the sequels must be.

Enjoy this scene my friends referred to as “The Glender” (2:00)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C1rrzkMzLwU

item.title: A Nightmare on Elm Street
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
Dillxn:

The way they portray Freddy is just terrible. I will not see this movie after seeing this trailer.

Yeah, I mean come on!

Why the fuck would they make a burn victim look anything like a burn victim? Just stupid.

Read full topic

item.title: A Nightmare on Elm Street
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
Dillxn:

maybe it’s just nostalgia, but I liked the series. Especially the seventh one, but that makes me a retard :retard:

The series was good, but they made Freddy stupider and stupider as the series progressed. He started out as this menacing shadowy figure…and by movie 6, he was going “Boing, boing, boing, boing!” I mean, c’mon… >

item.title: A Nightmare on Elm Street
item.dc:creator: Ramirezoid
item.description:
That’s the guy that played Rorschach doing Freddy.

I can’t blame them for wanting to remake it so it actually makes sense in one movie instead over the course of a dozen sequels. It looks like it might be decent enough.

Halloween Friday the Thirteenth weren’t all that bad so much as they were just kind of upsetting, but they didn’t suck.

and everyone knows how biased classic horror movie nerds are when it comes to bastard remakes and sequels.

Read full topic
